text: Sihamtara purbe nuhara sampradaye arau sihamtara pichata bahu dale'o asbikara karaichila. Pratyeka sampradaye nija nija raachulaka karaayatta karaara sankalpa karaichila arau sihamte asara kathata lipta haichila yate iyara dbaraa satyaka byartha karaiba parae. Phalata maye sihamtaka karaayatta karailo. Eteke kimana kathora achila mora sasti
